shows the amortizedmarket value along with unrealized GL and price change as of the day for the given security in the given portfolio Designed XAML screens with styles and triggers according to the business requirement Implemented Serializable objects Implemented various objects using generics and Observable collection Implemented Managed C Wrapper classes for Native C language DLLs Involved in
